definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: Extending your tongue helps flatten the back of your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 伸展舌頭可以讓你的舌頭變平。

sentences.english: Songliao Basin is a expanding and rifted basin which was formed in Mesozoic era.
sentences.chinese: 松遼盆地是一中生代形成的伸展裂陷盆地。

sentences.english: Scott, S. H. , and J. F. Kalaska. " Reaching Movements With Similar Hand Paths But Different Arm Orientations."
sentences.chinese: 類似手部路徑的伸展運動但手臂方向不同。

sentences.english: Then he branched out into Swedish and Moroccan oil refineries.
sentences.chinese: 然後他的產業又伸展到瑞典和摩洛哥的石油精煉行業。

sentences.english: Then poke additional holes, index finger joints extended, not hyperextended.
sentences.chinese: 食指關節要伸展，但不要過度伸展。

sentences.english: Then poke additional holes, index finger joints extended, not hyperextended.
sentences.chinese: 食指關節要伸展，但不要過度伸展。

sentences.english: The bleak moorland stretched on all sides as far as the eye could see.
sentences.chinese: 荒涼的曠野向四面伸展開去，一望無際。

sentences.english: You will feel the stretch along the right side of your neck.
sentences.chinese: 你將會感覺到自己的右側頸部得到了伸展。

sentences.english: The road stretches in frond of and behind the car.
sentences.chinese: 那條路在車子的前面和後面伸展着。

sentences.english: Balance combines good reach in forequarters with strong drive in hindquarters.
sentences.chinese: 充分的前軀伸展和強大的後軀驅動力配合默契。

sentences.english: A system of roads radiates from the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 一組道路從市中心向四面八方伸展出去。

sentences.english: Also do some stretches to loosen your muscles.
sentences.chinese: 然後再做些伸展運動來放鬆你的肌肉。

sentences.english: Bending knees and bouncing in the modern dance hangover stretch increases the warm-up.
sentences.chinese: 彎曲的膝蓋和在現代舞蹈解酒伸展彈跳增加熱身。

sentences.english: The influence of night absolute being also stretches our insides in the conversation room gradually.
sentences.chinese: 夜神的勢力也逐漸伸展到我們的談話室裏。

sentences.english: Red Jacket lay sprawled on the cobbles one hundred feet below.
sentences.chinese: 紅夾克四肢伸展，撲躺在三十多米底下的卵石街上。

sentences.english: The extensional system is a "horizontal layered" thin-skinned tectonics at the crustal scale.
sentences.chinese: 伸展構造是一種“水平層狀的”薄皮構造。

definition: to roll out/to extend/to smooth out/to unfold
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
